org.netbeans.jellytools

Class PluginsOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.Operator
      • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.ComponentOperator
        • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.ContainerOperator
          • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.WindowOperator
            • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.DialogOperator
              • org.netbeans.jemmy.operators.JDialogOperator
                • org.netbeans.jellytools.NbDialogOperator
                  • org.netbeans.jellytools.PluginsOperator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.netbeans.jemmy.Outputable, org.netbeans.jemmy.Timeoutable

    public class PluginsOperator
extends NbDialogOperator
    Handle Plugins dialog which is opened from main menu "Tools|Plugins". This dialog shows list of installed plugins and also list of available plugins. Plugins can be installed, uninstalled, activated and deactivated.

    Usage:

          pluginsOper = PluginsOperator.invoke();
      pluginsOper.install("My Plugin");
      pluginsOper.close();

        Parameters:

      • install

        public void install(String pluginName)
        Installs given plugin. It switches to Available Plugins tab, selects desired plugin, click Install button and finish installation.
        Parameters:
        pluginName -

      • install

        public void install(String[] pluginNames)
        Installs given plugins. It switches to Available Plugins tab, selects desired plugins, click Install button and finish installation.
        Parameters:
        pluginNames - array of plugin names to be installed

      • finishInstall

        public void finishInstall()
        Finish installation of selected plugins. Do the following:
        • waits for "NetBeans IDE Installer" dialog
        • in "NetBeans IDE Installer" dialog click Next
        • click "I accept..." check box
        • click Install button
        • wait until message that plugins were successfully installed appears
        • if restart is not needed wait until the module is turned on (message in main window status bar)
        • click Finish button to dismiss the dialog
